name: CI

on:
  push:
  pull_request:

jobs:
  python-ci:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Import check
        run: |
          python -c "import workshop_app; import workshop_app.main"

      - name: Lint-lite (compileall)
        run: |
          python -m compileall workshop_app
